title: A Closer Look at Bearing Fault Classification Approaches. (arXiv:2309.17001v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Rolling bearing fault diagnosis has garnered increased attention in recent years owing to its presence in rotating machinery across various industries, and an ever increasing demand for efficient operations. Prompt detection and accurate prediction of bearing failures can help reduce the likelihood of unexpected machine downtime and enhance maintenance schedules, averting lost productivity. Recent technological advances have enabled monitoring the health of these assets at scale using a variety of sensors, and predicting the failures using modern Machine Learning (ML) approaches including deep learning architectures.
